paper_abstract: STARS is a vision based real time gestural interface that allows both communicative and manipulative 3D hand gestures, which vary in motion and appearance, to control target generic personal computer applications. This input-output HMM based framework attains high recognition rates on a database consisting of 20 complex hand gestures. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: STARS: Sign tracking and recognition system using input-output HMMs
